item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.5.5
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.5.5
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Sun, 19 Jan 2025 11:58:00 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: update package dependencies
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin

item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.4.3
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.4.3
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:44:12 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: Bug Fixes
- Difference Quotient calcualtes an X array with the correct length (matches DeltaY/DeltaX) (Issue #36)
- Derivative correctly calculates the sampling interval dt (previously was off by a factor 2)
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin

item.title: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.2.12

Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Override library implementing ZMQ lazy pirate reliable request reply (RRR) protocal using RemoteControl SMO framework.

Release Notes: [1.1.2]
- update dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl v1.2.1.8
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.2.1.8
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:28:33 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.2.1]
- Updated dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
